name: SingletonListIterator_nextTest
description: Unit tests for the next method of SingletonListIterator.

test_cases.name: testNextSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful iteration and retrieval of the next element.

test_cases.name: testNextNoSuchElementException
test_cases.description: Tests that NoSuchElementException is thrown when calling next after the iterator has no more elements.

test_cases.name: testNextAfterRemove
test_cases.description: Tests that NoSuchElementException is thrown when calling next after removing the element.

test_cases.name: testNextAfterReset
test_cases.description: Tests the successful iteration and retrieval of the next element after resetting the iterator.

test_cases.name: testNextAfterSet
test_cases.description: Tests the successful iteration and retrieval of the next element after setting a new value and resetting the iterator.
